content.query:
USE ADLGen2_gold_db
GO

CREATE or ALTER PROC view_gold @ViewName NVARCHAR(100)
AS
BEGIN

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)

    SET @statement = N'CREATE or ALTER view ' + @ViewName + ' AS
       SELECT *
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
                BULK ''https://rhugveddatalakegen2.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/SalesLT/' + @ViewName + '/'',
                FORMAT = ''DELTA''
            ) AS [result]  
    '
EXEC(@statement)

END
GO
